name: tensorflow-image-recognition-chrome-extension
description: Chrome browser extension for using TensorFlow image recognition

scripts.copy: cp src/content.js dist/src/ && cp src/imagenet_classes.js dist/src/
scripts.build: parcel build src/background.js -d dist/src/ -o background && npm run copy
scripts.watch: npm run copy && parcel watch src/background.js --hmr-hostname localhost -d dist/src/ -o background

author: Jouni Kontinen <jouni.kontinen___polarspin.com>
